content:encoded:
Case Closed begins with Barrie Craig, Confidential Investigator and his story from October 24, 1951, Microfilm In The Fishtank.

(30:00) Our second story comes from The Adventures Of Michael Shayne. Here’s The Newton Murder Case, from April 2, 1945.

Download CaseClosed694

Escape into the golden age!

Case Closed is made possible by your support. If you’re able to help, visit donate.relicradio.com for more information. Thank you!
